head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAPORTE, MARGERY COLEMAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAPORTE, MARGERY COLEMAN

block.p: LaPORTE - Margery Coleman. Died on Wednesday of heart failure at her nursing home in Illinois. She was the wife of the late Walter LaPorte; mother of Stephen, David and Tom LaPorte, Marjorie Brillhart and Ann Colton; grandmother of six grandchildren, and sister of Patricia Gehron and Joan Coleman. In lieu of flowers, kindly donate to your local hospice.
